name: Project Hovercraft
description: Project Hovercraft is a hovercraft combat game. At the start of a match, all players pick a hovercraft, then drive around, and blow each other up! Battle it out with your friends online over a variety of locations, game types, and of course; hovercrafts!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0+ GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GT 550 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760 + DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
